definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: By the 20th century, views similar to Berkeley's were called phenomenalism.
sentences.chinese: 到20世纪，类似伯克利的观点是所谓的现象论。

sentences.english: The Stanford-Berkley competition is mostly sports-related.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福和伯克利之间的竞争大多是与运动相关的。

sentences.english: What is the Berkeley Earth Surface Temperature study?
sentences.chinese: 什么是伯克利地球表面温度研究所？
它在伯克利分校流行吗？

sentences.english: Like those anti-free-speechrioters in Berkeley and Portland?
sentences.chinese: 像伯克利和波兰的反言论自由的暴民一样？

sentences.english: It could be Berkeley or Columbia or maybe Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 可以是伯克利，哥伦比亚或者是柏林。

sentences.english: Inga Andersen Singing At " Bagatelle" Restaurant Off Berkeley Street.
sentences.chinese: 英格安德森在唱歌“小事”餐厅关闭伯克利街。

sentences.english: and I lived in the LA area for the last 7 years  before I came to Cal.
sentences.chinese: 而且在我伯克利之前的7年我一直住在洛杉矶地区。

sentences.english: Do you know any famous people who graduated from Berkeley?
sentences.chinese: 你知道从伯克利毕业的有哪些名人吗？

sentences.english: When I entered Berkeley, I hoped to carn a scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 我进伯克利时，希望能获得奖学金。

sentences.english: In Berkeley, we built the garden and a kitchen classroom.
sentences.chinese: 在伯克利，我们建立了一个食材园和一个厨房教室。

sentences.english: Life in Berkeley is very civilized.
sentences.chinese: 伯克利的生活是非常市民化的。

sentences.english: When do you take exams at Berkeley throughout the year?
sentences.chinese: 在伯克利，你们一年里都是什么时候考试？

sentences.english: To date, Berklee alumni have won a total of 176 Grammy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，伯克利校友共获得了176格莱美奖。

sentences.english: I would say that other top schools for rowing right now are Berkeley and Washington.
sentences.chinese: 现在赛艇的其他顶级学校是伯克利和华盛顿。

definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]
